mean_en: to rely on somebody/something and be able to trust them; (not usually used in the progressive tenses) to need money, help, etc. from somebody/something else for a particular purpose; (not used in the progressive tenses) to be affected or decided by something
sentence: Sometimes people have to depend on others for help.
sentence_trans: 有时候，人们需要依赖他人的帮助。
